name: Amexio image
description: Amexio image is an artifact that depicts visual perception.

properties.name: path
properties.description: Specifies the URL of an image, This attribute is useful only for images

properties.name: mda
properties.description: This attribute is useful for only material icons . Material Example mda='cloud'

properties.name: icon-class
properties.description: Material icon class name Material i.e icon-class=material-icons / font-awesome i.e icon-class= fa fa-address-book fa-lg

properties.name: filter
properties.description: filter type can be saturate / hue / invert / grayscale / brightness / blur / sepia / shadow / opacity

properties.name: overlay-effect
properties.description: overlay-effect can be set fade / box / left / top / bottom / right / title

properties.name: tilte-position
properties.description: overlay-text can be set top-right / bottom-right / bottom-left / top-left / centered
